appendix.title: Installing the Imagick extension

section.title: Installation requirements on other platforms
section.para: PHP >= 5.1.3 and ImageMagick >= 6.2.4 is required. The amount of formats supported is by Imagick is entirely dependent upon the amount of formats supported by your ImageMagick installation. For example, Imagemagick requires ghostscript to conduct PDF operations.

section.title: Installation requirements on Windows
section.para: Version information does not differ from that above. There are binaries available from &url.imagemagick; so that you can load this extension on Windows without need for a compiler.
